doc.title: Evil Menace
doc.plot: A demented scientist, Dr. Vic Toussaint and his group of hired mercenaries unleash a horde of undead creatures into a small city. He has a plot to make millions by developing a cure as well. But a young bartender, Devin and a group of zombie hunters gather their arsenal to lay waste to the flesh-eating creatures and foil Toussaint's plan.
